Contrariwise.stimulus: Nothing would be what it is because everything would be what it isn't. And contrariwise, what it is, it wouldn't be, and what it wouldn't be, it would. You see?

Raven.stimulus: Why is a raven like a writing desk?

Headstand.stimulus: Can you stand on your head?

Everything.stimulus: I suppose I ought to eat or drink something or other; but the great question is, 'What?'

Yesterday/Tomorrow.stimulus: If yesterday wasn't tomorrow, would today be Friday?

Mindseye.stimulus: Is what you see with your eyes closed the same as what you disappear into when they're open?
